00042 class KVIRC_API KviNotifyListManager : public QObject
00043 {
00044         friend class KviConsoleWindow;
00045         friend class KviConnectionInfo;
00046         friend class KviIrcServerParser;
00047         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00048         Q_OBJECT
00049 protected:
00050         KviNotifyListManager(KviIrcConnection * pConnection);
00051         ~KviNotifyListManager();
00052 protected:
00053         KviConsoleWindow       * m_pConsole;
00054         KviIrcConnection * m_pConnection;
00055 protected:
00056         virtual void start();
00057         virtual void stop();
00058         virtual bool handleUserhost(KviIrcMessage * msg);
00059         virtual bool handleIsOn(KviIrcMessage * msg);
00060         virtual bool handleWatchReply(KviIrcMessage *msg);
00061         void notifyOnLine(const QString &nick,const QString &user = QString(),const QString &host = QString(),const QString &szReason = QString(),bool bJoin=true);
00062         void notifyOffLine(const QString &nick,const QString &user = QString(),const QString &host = QString(),const QString &szReason = QString());
00063 public:
00064         KviConsoleWindow * console(){ return m_pConsole;  };
00065 };

00080         QString               m_szIsOnString;                 // m_pIsOnList in form of a string

00090 protected:
00091         virtual void start();
00092         virtual void stop();

00094         virtual bool handleIsOn(KviIrcMessage *msg);
00095 private:
